data.title: Victoria's Secret Angel Lais Ribeiro Wears The $2 Million 2017 Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra Designed And Hand-Crafted With Jewels By Mouawad
data.meta_description: /PRNewswire/ -- This holiday, Victoria's Secret introduces the highly anticipated Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra. Victoria's Secret Angel Lais Ribeiro will wear...
data.text:
NEW YORK, Nov. 1, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- This holiday, Victoria's Secret introduces the highly anticipated Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra. Victoria's Secret Angel Lais Ribeiro will wear the Fantasy Bra for the first time on runway in the 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, which airs November 28th at 10/9c PM on CBS.

Valued at $2 million, the 2017 Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra was designed exclusively for Victoria's Secret by world-renowned jeweler Mouawad. Handset with diamonds, yellow sapphires and blue topaz in 18 karat gold, the jewels are set into a Victoria's Secret Dream Angels Demi bra.

Glamorous and glittering and weighing more than 600 carats, the Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra took almost 350 hours to create and is embellished with nearly 6,000 precious gemstones.

The new Victoria's Secret Dream Angels collection features bras, panties and lingerie in shimmering shades of champagne and was inspired by the Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra—the champagne shade is a must-have addition to any lingerie wardrobe. This holiday, every woman can live the fantasy by shopping the collection, available in-stores and at victoriassecret.com! Adding additional sparkle and shine is the new Bombshell Nights fragrance which contains notes of Sparkling Cassis, Purple Dahlia and Golden Woods the perfect complement to champagne nights.

On November 1st, Victoria's Secret fans can get inside access at VictoriasSecret.com/FashionShow; Facebook.com/VictoriasSecret; Instagram/Twitter/Snapchat @VictoriasSecret with #VSFantasyBra, #VSFashionShow

Learn more about VS Angel Lais Ribeiro here: https://www.victoriassecret.com/vsallaccess/angels/lais-ribeiro

About Victoria's Secret

Victoria's Secret is the leading specialty retailer of lingerie and beauty products, dominating its field with modern fashion-inspired collections, prestige fragrances and body care, celebrated supermodels and world-famous runway shows. A business of L Brands (NYSE:LB), its more than 1000 Victoria's Secret Lingerie and Beauty stores, the catalogue and VictoriasSecret.com allow customers to shop the brand anywhere, anytime, from any place.

About Mouawad

Mouawad has been enchanting customers with magnificent jewels and timepieces since 1890. Mouawad is the official partner of the 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show. Led by fourth-generation Co-Guardians, Fred, Alain, and Pascal Mouawad, and backed by more than a century of excellence in its field, Mouawad remains a family business built upon artistic excellence, superb craftsmanship, trust, and relationships. Mouawad designs, manufactures, and sells its own exclusive jewelry and timepiece collections ranging from boutique collections and haute joaillerie to magnificent bespoke masterpieces and objects of art. Mouawad has been honored by the Guinness World Records five times, the most recent of which being for the Flower of Eternity Jewellery Coffer – the most valuable jewellery box in the world (US $3.5M). The vision at Mouawad has always been to enchant and build lifelong relationships with customers by offering a wide range of jewels and timepieces for all occasions.

SOURCE Victoria's Secret
